comments.body:
I can see onyx has a [cliconf plugin](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/plugins/cliconf/onyx.py#L65) that retrieves the target version at the time of initial connection.
You can refer to `get_capabilities()` [here](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/module_utils/network/ios/ios.py#L82)
